name: liquid-liberty-subquery
description: Subgraph for fetching OHLCV data for TradingView price charts

scripts.build:pulse: cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse subql build
scripts.build:sepolia: cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia subql build
scripts.build:local: cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local subql build
scripts.dev:docker: npm run build && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop npm run codegen && subql build
